Detailed Description

BtUncancelablePointToPointRequest is a child class of BtUncancelableRequest and implements the common properties for request that can realize a point to point communication and that can not be canceled. Any further concrete requests that address one single device and that can not be canceled are not directly derived from BtRequest. Instead of this they should be child classes of BtUncancelablePointToPointRequestRequest.
See BtRequest for a complete description of Bluetooth requests.

GetDevice returns the target this request is associated with.

void BtUncancelablePointToPointRequest::SetDevice (  const BtDevice &  device  ) 
 

Set target of this request.

SetDevice sets the target this request should be associated with. This request copies the passed in device to avoid dangling pointers when the request lives and the associated device description is destroyed.

Parameters:
device A reference to a BtDevice that should be the target this request should be associated with.
